item.title: May Day protests: A celebration of spring or a day for activism? - in pictures
item.author: Jonna.Lappalainen
item.description: While its roots lie in ancient spring festivals, the modern May Day is now a global day of action for workers' rights, commemorating the 1886 Haymarket Affair and the international labour movement.
